metadata.title: Upgrading to CDKTF Version 0.7
metadata.description: Update your import statements for the AWS provider and learn to migrate your projects.

outlineItems.title: Upgrading to CDK for Terraform Version 0.7

For blocks that can only appear once at most this is making the API harder to use. From this version on these blocks are going to be just the type instead of an array of a certain type."),mdx("p",null,"To migrate you need to update the ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"cdktf")," and ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"cdktf-cli")," version you are using to 0.7 and run ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"cdktf get")," in your project. The new bindings might use fewer arrays in the configuration than before, depending on the schema of the providers you use.
